analysis.functional_summary: This module defines control variables for tracking customer and account counts and their last processed identifiers using packed decimal format.
data_flow: Step 1: Initialization of control variables for customer and account counts and last identifiers
Step 2: These variables are likely used in processing logic elsewhere to track and update counts and identifiers
state_changes: Variable state changes: CONTROL-CUSTOMER-COUNT, CONTROL-CUSTOMER-LAST, CONTROL-ACCOUNT-COUNT, CONTROL-ACCOUNT-LAST
modernization_notes: Consider converting packed decimal fields to more modern data types if migrating to a new system
Evaluate the necessity of these control variables in the context of the entire system to determine if they can be refactored or optimized
analysis.analysis_notes: The module is a simple data structure definition with no logic or processing, indicating it serves as a shared resource for other parts of the system.
